rules.name: miss-records
rules.rule: SELECT source.* FROM source LEFT JOIN target ON coalesce(source.user_id, '') = coalesce(target.user_id, '') AND coalesce(source.first_name, '') = coalesce(target.first_name, '') AND coalesce(source.post_code, '') = coalesce(target.post_code, '') WHERE (NOT (source.user_id IS NULL AND source.user_id IS NULL AND source.post_code IS NULL)) AND (target.user_id IS NULL AND target.user_id IS NULL AND target.post_code IS NULL)
